data.eml:eml: Two new genera and species of Tingidae from Cretaceous amber from Myanmar (Burma) (Hemiptera: Heteroptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heiss, Ernst, Guilbert, Eric (2013): Two new genera and species of Tingidae from Cretaceous amber from Myanmar (Burma) (Hemiptera: Heteroptera). Zootaxa 3736 (4): 379-386, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3736.4.5
